alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; Russell; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 1:21PM CDT until May 09 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lincoln County in central Kansas... Ellsworth County in central Kansas... Southern Russell County in central Kansas... Northern Barton County in central Kansas... Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 120 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Tescott to 7 miles northeast of Ellsworth to near Milberger, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Salina, Russell, Ellsworth, Wilson, Claflin, Kanopolis, Holyrood, Assaria, Gorham, Brookville, Smolan, Dorrance, Beverly, Lorraine, New Cambria, Milberger, Falun, Glendale, Bunker Hill and Galatia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 82 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 176 and 266. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
